name: affilicats
description: Progressive Web App demo that showcases flaky network resilience measures

scripts.build: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && minify src/js/client.js --out-file docs/js/client.js && minify src/sw.js --out-file docs/sw.js && node build/build.js > docs/manifest.webmanifest && imagemin src/img/*.{webp,png,svg} --out-dir=docs/img && html-minifier --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --custom-attr-collapse /on/ --remove-attribute-quotes --process-scripts application/json --sort-attributes --sort-class-name --minify-urls -o docs/index.html src/index.html && html-minifier --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --custom-attr-collapse /on/ --remove-attribute-quotes --process-scripts application/json --sort-attributes --sort-class-name --minify-urls -o docs/forward.html src/forward.html

author: Thomas Steiner <steiner.thomas@gmail.com> (http://blog.tomayac.com/)
